price: 44. (Qur’aankanina) waa kuu waano (sharaf iyo darajo) adiga iyo dadkaaba, waana la idin weydiin.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
